inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed by NCI Laboratory of Pathology intra-cranial or spinal RELA-fusion ependymoma of grade I, II or III.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Has received two or fewer prior chemotherapy regimens
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have an evidence of tumor progression
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be greater than or equal to 18 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have a Karnofsky performance status of greater than or equal to 60
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Leukocytes: greater than or equal to 3,000/microliters
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Absolute neutrophil count: greater than or equal to 1,500/microliters
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Platelets: greater than or equal to 100,000/microliters
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin: greater than or equal to 10 gm/dL (can be achieved by transfusion)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: AST(SGOT)/ALT(SGPT): less than or equal to 2.5 X institutional upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Creatinine up to 1.5-times upper institutional limits OR eGFR within normal as predicted by the CKD-EPI equation (greater than or equal to 60 mL/min/1.73m(2).
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Anticancer treatment within designated period of time before enrollment including: surgery within 14 days
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Treatment with any investigational agent within 28 days before enrollment.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and has received high-dose steroids, hypertension, and chronic pain. The tumor is located in the T-L spine and is unresectable.
